StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: CIDR: NCI Genome Wide Predictors of Survival in Colorectal Cancer

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
This study was supported by the National Cancer Institute, National Institutes of Health (R01 CA176272, X01 HG006662).
Please note: additional details will be provided for N0147, N9741, and C08 specific funding.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (COL, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-COL-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
The letter of collaboration for this study is the CTEP Notification e-mail described in the “CTEP CRADA Collaborator Review Process,” which can found at the end of the dataset's Data Use Certification Agreement (see dbGaP study page). The “CTEP CRADA Collaborator Review Process” describes the process and timeline for DAC review, and also includes a template for the CTEP notification e-mail. Requestor must first send a CTEP Notification e-mail to NCICTEPDAR@mail.nih.gov, and then upload a copy of this e-mail as part of their data access request for this dataset. Please review the “CTEP CRADA Collaborator Review Process” carefully to understand the additional terms for this dataset, and contact NCICTEPDAR@mail.nih.gov or NCIDAC@mail.nih.gov regarding any questions.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
